mapper.select: SELECT ITEM_NO, ITEM_DATE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_SHORTPATH, ITEM_PRICE FROM ITEM ORDER BY ITEM_REGDATE DESC
SELECT ITEM_NO, ITEM_DATE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_SHORTPATH, ITEM_PRICE FROM ITEM WHERE ITEM_NAME LIKE '%${searchStr}%' OR ITEM_NO LIKE '%${searchStr}%' ORDER BY ITEM_REGDATE DESC

SELECT ITEM_NO , ITEM_GENDER, ITEM_TYPE, ITEM_DATE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_SIZE, ITEM_OPTION, ITEM_COLOR, ITEM_SHORTPATH, ITEM_IMAGEPATH, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_STOCK, ITEM_REGDATE, ITEM_SET FROM ITEM WHERE ITEM_NO = #{ITEM_NO}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEM ( ITEM_STOCK, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_DATE, ITEM_NO, ITEM_SIZE, ITEM_OPTION, ITEM_COLOR, ITEM_SHORTPATH, ITEM_IMAGEPATH, ITEM_REGDATE, ITEM_GENDER, ITEM_TYPE, ITEM_SET ) VALUES ( #{ITEM_STOCK}, #{ITEM_NAME}, #{ITEM_PRICE}, #{ITEM_DATE}, ITEM_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ITEM_SIZE}, #{ITEM_OPTION}, #{ITEM_COLOR}, #{ITEM_SHORTPATH}, #{ITEM_IMAGEPATH}, sysdate, #{ITEM_GENDER}, #{ITEM_TYPE}, #{ITEM_SET} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ITEM SET ITEM_NAME=#{ITEM_NAME}, ITEM_PRICE=#{ITEM_PRICE}, ITEM_GENDER=#{ITEM_GENDER}, ITEM_TYPE=#{ITEM_TYPE}, ITEM_DATE=#{ITEM_DATE}, ITEM_SIZE=#{ITEM_SIZE}, ITEM_OPTION=#{ITEM_OPTION}, ITEM_COLOR=#{ITEM_COLOR}, ITEM_SET=#{ITEM_SET} WHERE ITEM_NO=#{ITEM_NO}
mapper.select: SELECT COM_NO, COM_ORI_NO, COM_NAME, COM_PASSWD, COM_CONTENT, COM_REGDATE, COM_REF, COM_RE_STEP, COM_RE_LEVEL, COM_FILE_ORI_NAME, COM_FILE_SAVE_NAME, COM_CATEGORY FROM KSM_COMMENT WHERE COM_CATEGORY = #{COM_CATEGORY} ORDER BY COM_REF DESC, COM_RE_STEP DESC

SELECT COM_NO, COM_ORI_NO, COM_NAME, COM_PASSWD, COM_CONTENT, COM_REGDATE, COM_REF, COM_RE_STEP, COM_RE_LEVEL, COM_FILE_ORI_NAME, COM_FILE_SAVE_NAME, COM_CATEGORY FROM KSM_COMMENT WHERE COM_CATEGORY = #{COM_CATEGORY} AND ( COM_NAME LIKE '%${searchStr}%' OR COM_CONTENT LIKE '%${searchStr}%' ) ORDER BY COM_REF DESC, COM_RE_STEP DESC

SELECT COM_NO, COM_ORI_NO, COM_NAME, COM_PASSWD, COM_CONTENT, COM_REGDATE, COM_REF, COM_RE_STEP, COM_RE_LEVEL, COM_FILE_ORI_NAME, COM_FILE_SAVE_NAME, COM_CATEGORY FROM KSM_COMMENT WHERE COM_NO = #{COM_NO}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KSM_COMMENT ( COM_NO, COM_ORI_NO, COM_NAME, COM_PASSWD, COM_CONTENT, COM_REGDATE, COM_REF, COM_RE_STEP, COM_RE_LEVEL, COM_FILE_ORI_NAME, COM_FILE_SAVE_NAME, COM_CATEGORY ) VALUES ( COMMENT_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{COM_ORI_NO}, #{COM_NAME}, #{COM_PASSWD}, #{COM_CONTENT}, SYSDATE, #{COM_REF}, #{COM_RE_STEP}, #{COM_RE_LEVEL}, #{COM_FILE_ORI_NAME}, #{COM_FILE_SAVE_NAME}, #{COM_CATEGORY} )
mapper.update: UPDATE KSM_COMMENT SET COM_RE_STEP = COM_RE_STEP + 1 WHERE COM_REF = #{COM_REF} AND COM_RE_STEP >= #{COM_RE_STEP}
